petCare.title: Wellness & Preventative Care
petCare.shortDesc: Routine checkups, vaccinations, and nutritional guidance to keep animals healthy.
petCare.fullDesc: We provide physical exams, vaccinations, parasite control, and tailored nutrition plans to keep pets healthy. Regular visits help us detect conditions early and improve quality of life.

petCare.title: Dental Care
petCare.shortDesc: Comprehensive cleanings, extractions, and oral health education.
petCare.fullDesc: Our dental services include scaling, polishing, extractions, and guidance on maintaining oral hygiene. Good dental care prevents infections and ensures overall wellbeing.

petCare.title: Surgery & Emergency Care
petCare.shortDesc: State-of-the-art surgical facilities and compassionate 24/7 emergency services.
petCare.fullDesc: We handle routine surgeries as well as emergency cases. Our clinic has modern facilities and provides anesthesia monitoring, pain management, and compassionate recovery support.

livestock.title: Field Treatment
livestock.shortDesc: Door-to-door veterinary services for cattle, goats, sheep, and poultry.
livestock.fullDesc: We provide door-to-door veterinary services for livestock, ensuring prompt treatment for injuries, illnesses, and health emergencies at your farm.

livestock.title: Artificial Insemination
livestock.shortDesc: Boost herd reproduction with advanced AI techniques.
livestock.fullDesc: Our advanced reproductive techniques help improve genetics and reproduction rates in livestock herds, ensuring higher productivity and healthier offspring.

livestock.title: Breed Selection
livestock.shortDesc: Expert guidance to improve productivity and adaptability.
livestock.fullDesc: We offer expert advice to help farmers choose the right breeds that match their environment, market goals, and productivity needs.

livestock.title: Vaccination Programs
livestock.shortDesc: Comprehensive livestock vaccination schedules for disease prevention.
livestock.fullDesc: Protecting herds from diseases through scheduled vaccination programs designed to reduce outbreaks and ensure long-term herd health.

laboratory.title: Lab Tests
laboratory.shortDesc: Blood, urine, and fecal analysis for accurate diagnosis.
laboratory.fullDesc: Our diagnostic lab provides blood, urine, and fecal tests to ensure accurate diagnosis and targeted treatments for pets and livestock.

laboratory.title: Disease Screening
laboratory.shortDesc: Identify and control diseases before they spread.
laboratory.fullDesc: We identify and control potential diseases early through comprehensive screening, preventing them from spreading among pets or livestock.

laboratory.title: Reproductive Health
laboratory.shortDesc: Fertility testing and pregnancy diagnosis for pets and livestock.
laboratory.fullDesc: Our reproductive services include fertility testing, pregnancy diagnosis, and monitoring, helping animals reproduce safely and efficiently.

consultation.title: Nutrition Guidance
consultation.shortDesc: Custom feeding plans tailored to animals' specific needs.
consultation.fullDesc: We create personalized feeding plans to meet the specific needs of pets and livestock, ensuring balanced nutrition for growth, health, and productivity.

consultation.title: Farm Management
consultation.shortDesc: Training and support for sustainable and productive farming.
consultation.fullDesc: We provide hands-on training and advisory services in sustainable farming practices, animal husbandry, and efficient resource management.

consultation.title: Disease Prevention
consultation.shortDesc: Practical strategies to keep both pets and herds healthy.
consultation.fullDesc: Our preventive strategies include vaccination, deworming, hygiene programs, and monitoring to reduce risks of disease outbreaks in pets and herds.
